item.description:
Boston AREIA WIRE is a community of like-minded women who are looking to take their real estate business and their life to a whole new level.

Ann Bellamy will present . . . Finding Your Niche

If you do what you love, and you specialize in your strengths, it will be a joy to come to work each day, and that joy will show through in everything you do.

You want to invest in real estate, but you are confused about the different terms and what path is the right one for you.

Learn the different types of investing, and what skill sets match these activities
Ask your self the questions to help you figure out what you'd be good at
Determine the resources you'll need to execute the strategy you choose

Join us for an interactive discussion as we explore different options and help you decide the right path for you - and find your niche.


Whether you are a female entrepreneur, real estate professional, small business owner or someone simply interested in real estate, you will be able to tap into the W.I.R.E. We are dedicated to providing you opportunities for networking, education and motivation.

This luncheon meeting is held on the Fourth Tuesday of every month.

At the Boston AREIA WIRE you will:

Give you time to network with other Women In Real Estate
Feature speakers who are local successful Women In Real Estate
Educate you on various real estate strategies
Give you the ability to share tips and techniques on business strategies
Give you the ability to make new connections, forge new personal and business relationships and provide support and motivation to reach your goals.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: WIRE - Women In Real Estate
